content: indulge in the cozy comfort of the blackberry salad striped baby blanket a delightful crochet pattern perfect for gifting or keeping your little one warm this easy-level project features a beautiful combination of bobbles and stripes creating a visually appealing and tactile masterpiece the pattern includes clear written instructions and a helpful video tutorial for beginners **unique features-** easy-level pattern suitable for beginners incorporates bobbles and stripes for visual interest includes written instructions and video tutorial for guidance customizable size to fit your preferences **materials needed-** hook 5mm us size 8 0 yarn shown in lion brand cotton-ease 50/50 aran weight 1400-1450 yards
